conbody.p: To successfully perfrom the task of subtracting numbers ,you must know what is subtraction. The term "subtraction"represents a mathematical operation.Subtarction if a process, an action that you do perfrom using numbers.Subtarction allows you to find the difference of 2 numbers.
You use the minu(-)button to express the subtraction operation in the app.
In the subtraction process,you take a number and reduce it to a smaller number.Tat is, we take away one number from another.
